document_data.name: Redfang Peak
document_data.georefs: {{Cite dragon/277/Bazaar of the Bizarre: Soargar's Legacy|89}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Redfang Peak''' was a mountain located in the southern reaches of the [[Giantspire Mountains]].
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1275}}, King [[Lashilmbrar]] commissioned a mercenary band known as the [[Gauntlet of Doom]] to explore the area around Redfang Peak as part of a longstanding effort to find any trace of King [[Imbrar I]], who disappeared somewhere in the area during the {{YearlinkName|1127}}. While the mercenaries never returned to Impiltur, their captain, [[Delros Parander]], was subsequently seen wielding the famous royal Impilturan [[sword]] known as ''[[Malagar]]'', which he presumably discovered while on that expedition.
